value:
Working for the Order of Heroes
members here isn't much different
from what I was doing before.

Want to know the real Matthew?
Ha! Let's take it slow. I'll give you
half-truths instead of lies.

Hey there. Good work on the patrols.
I'm keeping an eye out too to make
sure no one suspicious sneaks in.

The way this strange world works...
I wonder... Could I ever be reunited
with my dear Leila again?

Spy training? Sure, that's a thing, but
we never do it in public. That always
leads to bad sorts finding you.

My boss wanted me to come
deliver a hello to you,
$Nu.$k$pYou two must have a pretty
strong friendship there.

Ha! Isn't that rich! A spy like
me—with this much power?

I'm good in combat, but now I'll
be even better!

Hmm. Maybe I should stick to
the shadows.

I work behind the scenes, but I
won't waste this—I promise.

The name's Matthew. I'm in the
service of the young master—I mean,
milord—Hector. Good to meet you.

Whoa, never a dull moment with you
around, is there? You really keep
a spy on his toes!$k$pSpeaking of which, you know how
we spies stick to the shadows?
It's not smart to have close friends.$k$pMakes sense, right? A spy needs
the flexibility to do what he
needs to, when he needs to.$k$pFriends just muck things up.$k$pThe only problem with all this
is you. You're the kind of person
a spy can't evade forever.$k$pOh, I'll keep trying, friend, but for
now, forget I said anything.
はっ！
そらっ！
うああっ！
Well, well...
You're wide open!
I'll finish you!
Let's settle this!
Hello there!
Ugh, sorry...
Heh
Oh! Have a new mission for me? Let's hear it!
No need for a shakedown. I never hide my weapons.
I sense no enemies here, not even in the shadows.
Need me to pry into someone's secrets? I'm your man!
Glad to chat, but I'm really more of a behind-the-scenes kind of guy.
We all have a place in our hearts that we'd...prefer...that no one goes poking around in.
You...have caught my interest!
All right.
And now?
Let's go.
